bug.author: vapaunic
bug.summary: [BUG] Fix data download in ojdata_exploration notebook
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
Data loading in data exploration notebook does not work, as the data has to be downloaded first to the local yx.csv and storedemo.csv files. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
